littleTitleProjet: Studying the word count of a database of simplfied and traditional Chinese articles
resultRecap: In this project I counted the frequency of all the characters presents in a database of more than 140 000 Chinese articles order to study if they would be a significient difference between the 20 most used characters in traditional and simplified Chinese articles and found an explanation to the difference.
skills: Processing a big number of Chinese characters data

photoProjet.desc: Word count of characters in simplified Chinese articles
